section.heading: Bonus pay and special awards pay; reporting requirements.
section.text: In addition to any other requirements under this subchapter, any payment of bonus pay or special awards pay made pursuant to ยง 1-551.02(b) shall be followed, within 60 days of the payment, by notification in writing to the relevant personnel authority of the issuance of the payment and a description of the basis for the payment that includes the employee's name, title, and salary, the payment amount, and a detailed justification for the payment.
